name: ATV XTrem / Quad
description:
The Best Quad Game that you ever seen!

Travel around the world and try to be the best to get all awards.
Discover unique race tracks in many different countries: Brazil, Utah, Alaska, Dubai, L.A. and more...

An eXtreme Gaming Experience awaits you!

Set your own game settings:

• Control method
• Difficulty level
• Ideal point of view
• Rendering quality
• ...

Find all your scores and rewards by pressing the "Scores" button in the main menu.
Share your scores with your friends in the worldwide leaderboard.

Exceed your limits!

••• Game Features •••

• Drive your own powerful Quad!
• Striking Drift!
• Visit many different countries!
• Full 3D Real Time Rendering!
• High Graphic Quality!
